objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' fill='none' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#7B4AE2'/><rect x='-49' y='0' width='590' height='1080' rx='0' ry='0' fill='#8B4AE2'/><defs><radialGradient id='paintGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%' fx='50%' fy='50%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#9356FF; stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#7B4AE2; stop-opacity:1'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='590' height='1080' fill='url(#paintGradient)'/><circle cx='100' cy='200' r='40' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='200' cy='400' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='300' cy='250' r='60' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='450' cy='600' r='35' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='150' cy='800' r='50' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='350' cy='950' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='480' cy='300' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='400' cy='700' r='55' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='850' cy='200' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='750' cy='350' r='20' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='900' cy='500' r='45' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='800' cy='700' r='25' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.15'/><circle cx='950' cy='900' r='35' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.2'/><circle cx='700' cy='950' r='30' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='0.1'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='1080' fill='#6DD04B' fill-opacity='0.15'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Super-sized 4 Liter Bottle
• Non-toxic & Eco-friendly
• Creates Biggest, Brightest Bubbles

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
The banner features a playful and vibrant layout, designed to promote a children's bubble product. The left half contains layered text blocks including a bold title (`heading`) in a large, chunky font, a subheading (`tagline`) in bright yellow, a bullet list containing product features (`description`), a prominent price tag (`price`), and a distinct call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with the label (`cta`). The background is a split design with gradients and circular bubble motifs, adding a fun and effervescent feel. The right half showcases the product image (`product_image`) prominently against the purple backdrop.

**Color Palette:**
- Purple (#7B4AE2, #8B4AE2)
- Yellow (#FFDE59)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Lime Green (#6DD04B)
product_color: The product image of "Gazillion Bubbles" features a vibrant and playful color palette ideal for children's advertising. Dominant colors include lime green (#7CF360) used for the bubble solution and bottle, and vivid purple (#7D3EB0) for the label and cap, adding a rich contrast. The logo incorporates bright yellow (#FFD100), electric green (#B7E900), deep purple (#482485), and subtle orange (#F78F1E) accents, each layered with outlines that create a 3D pop effect. Soft bubble hues like lavender (#D0C7FF) and light blue (#A3DFFF) blend smoothly with the background for a fun, dynamic visual. These colors highlight excitement and playfulness, perfect for an engaging banner design.
